message.content:
cs.CG, cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.GR, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the geometric properties of curves on surfaces, specifically on the surface of a convex polyhedron. This falls under computational geometry (cs.CG) and graph theory (cs.GT). The paper also discusses the visibility of points on the curve, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DS) and graph theory (cs.GR). Finally, the paper mentions a new type of unfolding of the surface of the polyhedron, which could potentially fall under computational topology (cs.SI).
